summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1934, for the improvement of North 46th Street, from Fremont Avenue to Palatine Avenue, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, under Ordinance No. 20052 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
